text: Charles Tony Bratley (born 30 April 1939) is an English retired professional footballer who played as a full-back. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:People from Spalding, Lincolnshire Category:English footballers Category:Association football fullbacks Category:Grimsby Town F.C. players Category:Gainsborough Trinity F.C. players Category:English Football League players Category:Living people
title: Tony Bratley
